creditline: Gift of the Dr. Ira and Maureen Adelman Collection
description: ceramic with relief designs; one side has a child in tan robes riding on the back of a giant lizard with very long toes/ claws; opposite side has a tree in green and blue; brown, green and blue glaze; jade stopper; spoon lost
inscription: incised on bottom: Chinese inscription indicating bottle was produced during the Yongzheng period of the Qing dynasty  (1722-1735)
title: Ceramic snuff bottle with painted decorations in relief
